  • Method Details

    • opAndWithoutPosition

      void opAndWithoutPosition(io.github.hyerica_bdml.indexer.DocumentCursor op1, io.github.hyerica_bdml.indexer.DocumentCursor op2, io.github.hyerica_bdml.indexer.IntermediateList out) throws IOException
      Intersection with two inverted lists without considering positions of terms
      Parameters:
      op1 - The DocumentCursor instance to access the left inverted list
      op2 - The DocumentCursor instance to access the right inverted list
      out - The IntermediateList instance to output the result
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception while accessing inverted list

    • opAndWithPosition

      void opAndWithPosition(io.github.hyerica_bdml.indexer.DocumentCursor op1, io.github.hyerica_bdml.indexer.DocumentCursor op2, int shift, io.github.hyerica_bdml.indexer.IntermediatePositionalList out) throws IOException
      Positional intersection with two inverted lists given the distance between two terms in query
      Parameters:
      op1 - The DocumentCursor instance to access the left inverted list
      op2 - The DocumentCursor instance to access the right inverted list
      shift - The distance between two terms in query
      out - The IntermediatePositionalList instance to output the result
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception while accessing inverted list

    • parseQuery

      QueryPlanTree parseQuery(String query, io.github.hyerica_bdml.indexer.StatAPI stat) throws Exception
      Generating query plan tree by parsing the query string
      Parameters:
      query - The query string
      stat - The API to obtain statistics of index terms (e.g., inverted list size)
      Returns:
      A query plan tree
      Throws:
      Exception - Exception while parsing query
